provisions of Article 38 of the Occupational Safety and Health Act" and Article 51 of the "Enforcement Rules of the  Occupational"

column1: 彙總。

column1: (2).工作者數於103年以前係指事業單位僱用之勞工，自104年起係指事業單位僱用之勞工及受工作場所負責人ˉ
指揮或監督從事勞動之人。
column7: (2).The term  workers " referred to in this sheet means laborers prior to 2014
column8: and then it means laborers or other people engaged"

column7: in work and directed or supervised by the responsible people in workplaces.

column1: (3).失能傷害頻率(人次/百萬工時，小數點以下三位不計)＝失能傷害次數／總經歷工時＊1,000,000。ˉ
(4).失能傷害嚴重率(日/百萬工時，小數點以下不計)＝總損失工作日數／總經歷工時＊1,000,000。ˉ
column7: (3).Frequency of disability (excluding after the third decimal point)=Times of disability / Total person-work hours *1,000,000.

column1: (5).本表不含上下班交通事故。ˉ
column7: (4).Severity of disability (excluding after the decimal point)=Total workday lost / Total person-work hours *1,000,000.
(5).Data series in the table exclude the traffic accidents on the commute.
